Couldn't say why Portal 2 is just so goddamn good. 

I typically don't make serious reviews when it comes to games, but this game was just such a genuine experience that by the end of it, I wished there was more to mess around with, more levels to play, more of that sweet, sweet, intuitive Valve game design to indulge. 

Guess we'll just have to wait, see if the executives decide that we masses really do need a third title.
